body.name: USX Mount Advanced Tilt TV Wall Mount for Most 42-90 inch TVs, Easy to Install Extension TV Mount Extending to 7 inch, Universal Wall Mount TV Bracket Up to 24'' Studs, VESA 600 x 400mm and 120lbs
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 1 hr 21 mins
features: 【Universal Design】Advanced tilt TV wall Mount fits most 42-90" TVs up to 120 LBS, VESA Size 200*100mm to 600*400mm，up to 24" Wood Studs & 120lbs. Please confirm the VESA Size and Weight of tv before you purchase.

【Max Extension Adjustable】Tilt angle +2/-15°( Tips: You can Tool-less tilting the degree), Large Extension design makes your TV mount getting the best viewing angle on your position. Our Full Tilt TV Bracket extend from 2.69" to 7.18” from the wall to save space and easy cable access.

【Stable Structure】The TV wall bracket is made of heavy duty steel by lots of advanced automatic machines such as robot welding, etc. All of them are designed and tested as international safety standard with 4 times loading without any problems, and They are tested in UL lab in order that they are delivered in good quality.

【Easy to Installation】Easy to install this TV bracket on wood stud or concrete wall with detailed instruction, all included hardware pre-labelled bags(Remarks can help you distinguish which screw you should use). Pulling straps can help you easily lock and release your TV. The TV mount can easily install on 12/16/24 inch wood studs and solid concrete wall, not for dry wall. If you need 10X50mm concrete anchors, please let us know to get it.

【Product Includes】Our TV bracket came with all required hardware. We provide professional 10-year customer service. Not sure this mount will work with your TV? Please let us know the Complete TV models. Our engineers will simulate the installation for you.

ATTCH TV PLATE TO TV Note: Dont use electric drill Attach Wall Plate to Wall Note: This TV wall mount is designed for use in wood stud and solid concrete wall. DO NOT install into drywall alone. Hang and Secure TV to Wall Plate Note: Before hanging TV, please conduct "wall plate installation integrity test" first.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy, easy install, holds position very well
reviews.reviewText: Used this to replace the factory mount that came with my 65" LG TV. The LG mount was very flimsy and this one was a massive improvement. Install was very easy with the included template. The pull out is just right for easy hanging and working with any cables/wires. Excellent item for the price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install if you’re handy. Works as advertised. Will buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Tv mount was very easy to install, makes tv look great on the wall

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not a "Newer Version" but it's ok
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this as it's supposed to be a newer version of a mount I already owned (see link). It works fine, but is not a newer version of the mount I own. It does not extend as far or swivel as much as the other one. I wish I had just gone with the version I had. I specifically wanted the same functionality, because the TV is in a corner of the room and it would be nice to be able to turn it more.https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B08M92P11W/ref=ppx_yo_dt_b_search_asin_title?ie=UTF8&psc=1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great product. Used it on a 75" Hisense TV. Very well made, heavy gauge metal, simple install. Very pleased with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I lije the ease of installation ahd being able to install on oy own without any help

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is stranger than it looks
reviews.reviewText: Hold up my 85 inch Samsung Tv without any problem so far. It is also cheap too. Would recommend if you want some cheap tv hanger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as described!
reviews.reviewText: Works as described, easy to mount. Seems very sturdy, holding a 75" TV.
